sentence.Network_en: The onus is on employers to follow health and safety laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇主有义务遵行健康安全法。

sentence.Network_en: The onus is on government departments to show cause why information cannot be disclosed.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府部门有责任说明不能把信息公开的理由.

sentence.Network_en: The onus is on the shopkeeper to provide goods which live up to the quality of their description.
sentence.Network_cn: 店主有义务提供质量与其描述相符的商品。

...卵形弱斑蛛（学名：Ischnothyreus onus）为卵形蛛科弱斑蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于杭州等地，一般栖息于落叶层的下部。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Ischnothyreus onus<br.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, literally load or burden'

entry.def: If you say that the onus is on someone to do something, you mean it is their duty or responsibility to do it.

example.ex: The onus is on the shopkeeper to provide goods which live up to the quality of their description...
example.tran: 店主有义务提供质量与其描述相符的商品。

example.ex: The onus of proof is reversed in libel actions and placed firmly on the defender.
example.tran: 在诽谤诉讼中，举证责任反过来由辩方全权承担。

auth_sentence.content: The onus is now on financing needs at home.
auth_sentence.res_content: The onus is now on financing needs at home.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The onus is now on financing needs at home.

auth_sentence.content: The onus is on the proposer to present data.
auth_sentence.res_content: The onus is on the proposer to present data.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The onus is on the proposer to present data.

auth_sentence.content: The onus is on you to prove your assertions.
auth_sentence.res_content: The onus is on you to prove your assertions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The onus is on you to prove your assertions.

stems_affixes.word_buile: on=oner负担+us表示名词→n.义务,责任
ex出+oner负担+ate表动词→从负担中摆脱出来→无罪释放

sentences.en: The onus is on government departments to show cause why information cannot be disclosed.
sentences.cn: 政府部门有责任说明不能把信息公开的理由。
